channel.title: CVE Feed for CircuitVerse -- CircuitVerse
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CircuitVerse -- CircuitVerse

item.title: CVE-2022-36038|2024-08-03T09:52:00.359Z -- circuitverse -- circuitverse
item.description: CircuitVerse is an open-source platform which allows users to construct digital logic circuits online. A remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in CircuitVerse allows authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code via specially crafted JSON payloads. This issue may lead to Remote Code Execution (RCE). A patch is available in commit number 7b3023a99499a7675f10f2c1d9effdf10c35fb6e. There are currently no known workarounds.
